window.slider: QSlider{background: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0);} QSlider::groove:horizontal {height: 10px; margin: 0px; border-radius: 5px; background: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0.5);} QSlider::handle:horizontal {background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 0px solid rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 16px; margin-bottom: -3px; margin-top: -3px; border-radius: 8px;} QSlider::sub-page:qlineargradient {background: rgb(28, 211, 162); border-radius: 5px;}
window.icons: QPushButton:!hover {background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0px; font: 13pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-align:center} QPushButton:hover{background-color: rgb(70, 70, 70, 0); border-radius: 0px; font: 13pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(221, 128, 204); text-align:center} QPushButton:pressed{background-color: rgb(100, 100, 100, 0); border-radius: 0px; font: 13pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(153, 50, 204); text-align:center}
window.icons+: QPushButton:!hover {background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0px; border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(28, 211, 162); padding-bottom: 0px; border-top: 3px solid rgb(28, 211, 162, 0); padding-top: 0px; font: 13pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(28, 211, 162); text-align:center} QPushButton:hover{background-color: rgb(70, 70, 70, 0); border-radius: 0px; font: 13pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(221, 128, 204); text-align:center} QPushButton:pressed{background-color: rgb(100, 100, 100, 0); border-radius: 0px; font: 13pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(153, 50, 204); text-align:center}

settings_window.string: QGroupBox {font: 13pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-radius: 0px; border-top: 3px solid rgb(28, 211, 162); margin-top: 15px; background-color: rgb(60, 60, 60, 0)} QGroupBox::title {subcontrol-origin: margin; padding: 0px 10px 0px 0px} QLabel {font: 10pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color:rgb(0, 0, 0, 0)}

theme_button_image.c1: QLabel {background-color: rgb(200, 200, 200); border-top-left-radius: 10px; border-bottom-left-radius: 10px; border-top-right-radius: 0px; border-bottom-right-radius: 0px}
theme_button_image.c2: QLabel {background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-top-left-radius: 0px; border-bottom-left-radius: 0px; border-top-right-radius: 10px; border-bottom-right-radius: 10px}}

my_library.song_name: QLabel {background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0); font: 10pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(255, 255, 255)}
my_library.author: QLabel {background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0); font: 8pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(200, 200, 200)}

search_window.searchbar: QLineEdit {font: 13pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-radius: 10px; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding-left: 100px}
search_window.error_bar: QLabel {font: 18pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-radius: 10px; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0);}

window.slider: QSlider{background: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0);} QSlider::groove:horizontal {height: 10px; margin: 0px; border-radius: 5px; background: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0.5);} QSlider::handle:horizontal {background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 0px solid rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 16px; margin-bottom: -3px; margin-top: -3px; border-radius: 8px;} QSlider::sub-page:qlineargradient {background: rgb(28, 211, 162); border-radius: 5px;}

window.icons+: QPushButton:!hover {background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0px; border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(28, 211, 162); padding-bottom: 0px; border-top: 3px solid rgb(28, 211, 162, 0); padding-top: 0px; font: 13pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(28, 211, 162); text-align:center} QPushButton:hover{background-color: rgb(70, 70, 70, 0); border-radius: 0px; font: 13pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(221, 128, 204); text-align:center} QPushButton:pressed{background-color: rgb(100, 100, 100, 0); border-radius: 0px; font: 13pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(153, 50, 204); text-align:center}

theme_button_image.c1: QLabel {background-color: rgb(50, 50, 50); border-top-left-radius: 10px; border-bottom-left-radius: 10px; border-top-right-radius: 0px; border-bottom-right-radius: 0px}

my_library.song_name: QLabel {background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0); font: 10pt; font-family: 'Franklin Gothic'; color: rgb(255, 255, 255)}
